post:
Take a look at our Cloud VPS offers. All our Cloud VPS Plans come with SSDOnly and High Availability.


CloudVPS Jar from € 9,90 to € 4,95 a month

- 1 Intel Xeon Core
- 1 GB Memory
- 50 GB SSDOnly
- 2 TB Traffica
- 1 Snapshots
- Easy Monitoring


CloudVPS Bucket from € 29,90 to € 14,95 a month

- 2 Intel Xeon Core
- 4 GB Memory
- 150 GB SSDOnly
- 5 TB Traffic
- 2 Snapshots
- Easy Monitoring



CloudVPS Barrel from € 49.90 to € 24.95 a month

- 4 Intel Xeon Core
- 8 GB Memory
- 300 GB SSDOnly
- 10 TB Traffic
- 4 Snapshots
- Easy Monitoring


Our Heavenly Cloud VPS Features

- Instant Setup Your Cloud VPS is provisioned in less than 2 minutes.

- Instant Snapshots Take a snapshot of your Cloud machine and revert to that snapshot at anytime.

- Smart Monitoring Tools Monitor the health of your Cloud VPS with our smart monitoring tools.

- Advanced Firewall Secure your cloud with our advanced firewall.

- 100+ Templates Choose between more than 100 prefconfigures OS templates.

- 1 Gbps Uplink Connection Your Cloud VPS is connected to a 1 Gbps Uplink connection.

- iOS and Android apps We provide comprehensive mobile cloud management on your smartphone





About Snel.com
==========================================================================================================================================

Snel.com is a Dutch hosting provider. Our company was founded in 2010 and we are located in Rotterdam, a small dynamic city with a passionately beating heart. In this small city we run a company that has a passionately beating heart for hosting. We provide fast and simple hosting solutions with a great focus on automation. In a world where time is literally money we want our customers to save on both by providing them Cloud hosting plans with instant setup and an automated platform with enough features to virtually do anything. We believe that the simplicity of our services and treating customers as friends sets us apart from the competition.
